headline: Announcing the Beta for WARP for macOS and Windows
keywords: WARP, 1.1.1.1, Security, Speed & Reliability, Privacy, Beta, Resolver, DNS, Product News
description: While WARP started as an option within the 1.1.1.1 app, it's really a technology that can benefit any device connected to the Internet. In fact, one of the most common requests we've gotten over the last year is support for WARP for macOS and Windows. Today we're announcing exactly that.
